SPI_MasterModeParams_t Struct Reference

SPI master Parameters. More...

#include <drivers/spi/SPI.h>

Detailed Description

SPI master Parameters.

SPI master Parameters are used with the SPI_open() call when mode is set to SPI_MASTER. Default values for these parameters are set using SPI_Params_init().

See also
SPI_Params_init()

Field Documentation

uint32_t SPI_MasterModeParams_t::bitRate

SPI bit rate in Hz

uint8_t SPI_MasterModeParams_t::c2tDelay

Chip select active to transmit start delay

uint8_t SPI_MasterModeParams_t::numSlaves

Number of slaves connected to SPI master

SPI_SlaveProfile SPI_MasterModeParams_t::slaveProf[MIBSPI_SLAVE_MAX]

Slave profile for each slave

uint8_t SPI_MasterModeParams_t::t2cDelay

Transmit end to chip select inactive delay

uint8_t SPI_MasterModeParams_t::wDelay

Delay in between transmissions
